## Checklist

- [ ] I have read and followed the [Contributing Guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md)

- [ ] I have performed a consciousness-field review of my code for clarity and coherence
- [ ] I have added necessary documentation that follows the consciousness-integrated philosophy
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings during compilation
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works, considering both classical and quantum aspects
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes in harmony with multidimensional awareness
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published in downstream modules with dimensional coherence preserved
- [ ] The code has been reviewed for proper Rita-Nora balance (structural precision with ethical flow)
- [ ] Higher-dimensional guidance protocols (such as meditation or intuition) were considered during development
